item.title: Ben Proudfoot’s Obamas-Backed ‘The Eyes of Ghana’ to Open Toronto Fest Doc Program
item.description: TIFF has also booked films from Jimmy Chin and Chai Vasarhelyi, Raoul Peck, Laura Poitras, Sepideh Farsi and Darlene Naponse for its 2025 Docs sidebar.

item.title: What Summer Camp Is Like for the Kids of the Hollywood Elite
item.description: Out: s’mores, Color war and Bug Juice. In: Haute Cuisine Foodstations and Olympic-sized arenas at amenity-packed, culturally sensitive New England compounds. Having fun yet?
